promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute epic spider fighting-type pokemon with ancient wings. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or spider. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Canywebspin, a a chibi cute epic spider fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Rocky Tackle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "spider", "fighting" or "Canywebspin". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, spider-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Inhabiting canyon-like terrains, this petite yet fierce arachnid Pokémon, Canywebspin, skillfully employs its Rocky Tackle amidst its silk-laden battlegrounds.
